sourcesContent: üéì UNIFOR home Home school Cursos calendar_month Semestres menu_book Disciplinas admin_panel_settings Administra√ß√£o assignment Matriz Curricular import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { KeycloakService } from 'keycloak-angular'; @Component({ selector: 'app-layout', templateUrl: './layout.component.html', styleUrls: ['./layout.component.scss'], }) export class LayoutComponent implements OnInit { userName: string = ''; roles: string[] = []; // flags de perfil isAdmin = false; isCoordenador = false; isProfessor = false; isAluno = false; constructor(private keycloakService: KeycloakService) {} async ngOnInit() { try { const profile = await this.keycloakService.loadUserProfile(); this.userName = profile.firstName ?? 'Usu√°rio'; this.roles = this.keycloakService.getUserRoles(); // define flags de acesso this.isAdmin = this.roles.includes('ADMIN'); this.isCoordenador = this.roles.includes('COORDENADOR'); this.isProfessor = this.roles.includes('PROFESSOR'); this.isAluno = this.roles.includes('ALUNO'); } catch (error) { console.error('Erro ao carregar perfil do usu√°rio:', error); } } async logout() { try { await this.keycloakService.logout(window.location.origin); } catch (error) { console.error('Erro ao sair:', error); } } }
